Ebbro 44190 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R32) 1994 JGTC Series GT1 Class 2nd Place M. Hasemi

Purchased: 2013

Masahiro Hasemi started racing for Nissan in 1964 winning many championship titles along the way. The 1994 JGTC season was the first full season of the All-Japan Grand Touring Car Championship and Hasemi finished 2nd overall. This would be his best result in the JGTC series. Hasemi retired from driving in 2001 and now runs Hasemi Sport, a JGTC racing team and Nissan aftermarket parts company.
